title: Straightening Out AngularJS with Python
summary: AngularJS is a really exciting tool for building super slick single-page apps. But if you want them to play nice with a Python backend (Django, Pyramid, Flask, etc.) you're going to have to do a little bit of wrangling. These are the design patterns that worked for us.
